job_history.work_description: Added detail-oriented, results-driven, and efficient mindset to Finance team of five. Accounts payable, prepaid expenses, and fixed assets. Acquisition of Riverside Bank in December 2014 that increased total assets from $550 million to $850 million. Purchase Loan Accounting - M&A process that generated an additional 40% of monthly income.
Daily activities: Items processing, ACH file verification, and incoming/outgoing wire operations. General ledger reconciliations. Wrote and updated procedures.

Accounts payable / receivable process. Worked independently to set up an automated 1099 process in accounting system, Inacct. Interacted with IRS representatives and researched regulations in regards to 1099-INT/MISC requirements.
Volunteered in Guatemala to help a Microfinance organization improve community outreach. Performed marketing and sales campaigns with local entrepreneurs in rural communities.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in accounting, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and fixed assets management, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Handled financial data and performed general ledger reconciliations, indicating strong proficiency in financial analysis.

skills.name: Mergers and Acquisitions
skills.explanation: Participated in the acquisition of Riverside Bank, which increased total assets, showing a solid working proficiency in M&A.

skills.name: Financial Planning
skills.explanation: Involved in the setup of an automated 1099 process and interacted with IRS representatives, indicating a solid working proficiency in financial planning.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Added a detail-oriented mindset to the Finance team, but no direct leadership experience mentioned, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.explanation: Performed marketing and sales campaigns with local entrepreneurs in rural communities, indicating some practical experience in marketing.

skills.name: International Business
skills.explanation: Participated in a study abroad program and worked with a Microfinance organization in Guatemala, indicating some practical experience in international business.
